multiple_example_options.name: Mercer-only
multiple_example_options.description: The Mercer-only logo is to be used in headers on desktop, tablet, and mobile.

multiple_example_options.name: Mercer-only (Reverse)
multiple_example_options.description: The reverse Mercer-only logo is also available for mid-tone and darker background colors in the header.

multiple_example_options.name: With Lock-up
multiple_example_options.description: The Mercer logo with the, "Make Tomorrow, Today" lock-up appears in a brand-compliant bar as part of the footer. This logo is also available in French and Chinese in the complete set for download.

multiple_example_options.name: With Lock-up (reverse)
multiple_example_options.description: The reverse horizontal logo is also available for mid-tone and darker background colors. This logo is also available in French and Chinese in the complete set for download.

multiple_example_options.name: Marsh & Mclennan
multiple_example_options.description: The Mercer-only logo is to be used in headers on desktop, tablet, and mobile.

multiple_example_options.name: Marsh & Mclennan (reverse)
multiple_example_options.description: The reverse Marsh & McLennan logo is also available for mid-tone and darker background colors in the header.
